summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2544 for the improvement of Nickerson Street, from Third Avenue West to the westerly margin of Sixth Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same; by constructing curbs and gutters; by constructing concrete sidewalks, and by making all necessary provisions to care for the surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 29492, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
